title: Write scripts/init_accountant.js

requirements.text: Create the file `scripts/init_accountant.js` containing a Node.js script that: (1) uses @dfinity/agent and @dfinity/principal to connect to the IC, (2) fetches the Principal IDs for all 9 agents currently registered in The_Orchestrator by calling its agent registry query, (3) formats the results into the array structure expected by the accountant canister's initializeRegistry(agents) function, and (4) calls initializeRegistry(agents) on the accountant canister. The script must only be written — do not execute it. Do not modify any existing files.

quotes: Write a Node.js script at scripts/init_accountant.js that fetches all 9 agent Principal IDs from The_Orchestrator, formats them into the correct array structure, and calls accountant canister's initializeRegistry(agents) function. Do not execute it, do not modify any existing files.

acceptanceCriteria: The file `scripts/init_accountant.js` exists in the workspace under the `scripts/` directory.
The script connects to the IC and targets The_Orchestrator canister to query all 9 registered agent Principal IDs.
The script formats the retrieved principals into the array structure expected by accountant canister's initializeRegistry(agents) function.
The script calls initializeRegistry(agents) on the accountant canister.

constraints: Do not modify any existing files — not backend/main.mo, not dfx.json, not any frontend file, and not any other existing file.
Do not execute the script — only write it to the workspace.
Write only scripts/init_accountant.js and nothing else.
nonGoals: Executing or running the init_accountant.js script.
Modifying dfx.json or any canister configuration.
Modifying backend/main.mo or any Motoko source file.
Creating any files other than scripts/init_accountant.js.
